content: 3 k4 *yo k3 repeat from* to last st k1 row 5 k2 k2tog *yo ssk k1 k2tog yo sl2 as if to k2tog k1 p2sso repeat from* to 9 sts before end yo ssk k1 k2tog yo ssk k2 row 7 k2 *k1 k2tog yo k1 yo ssk repeat from* to 3 sts before end k3 row 9 k4 *yo k3 repeat from* to last st k1 row 11 k2 *k1 k2tog yo sl2 as if to k2tog k1 p2sso yo ssk repeat from* to 3 sts before end k3 row 12 k2 p to 2 sts before end k2 change to main color next row k2 m1 k to 2 sts before end m1 k2 next row k2 m1 k to 2 sts before end m1 k2 next row k3 *yo k3 repeat from* to end next row k all sts bobble all sts knitwise weave in all ends and wet block page 2 muh-muhs © 2013 grasflecken/ isabell kraemer do not reproduce or sell the pattern or sell items that are knitted from this pattern for any questions please contact grasfleckenbylilalu@gmail com abbreviations co cast on k knit m1 make 1 insert left needle under loop between sts and knit through backloop increase st s stitch es yo yarn over p purl ssk slip slip knit through backloops decrease k2tog k 2 sts together as 1 decrease sl2 slip 2 sts as if to k2tog p2sso pass 2 slipped sts over bobble bind off page 3 muh-muhs © 2013 grasflecken/ isabell kraemer do not reproduce or sell the pattern or sell items that are knitted from this pattern for any questions please contact grasfleckenbylilalu@gmail com
